name: Enter the Chinobi
description:
As a Ninja in training, you will earn new abilities and fight your way to the top of the mountain, and take on Quests.

And become a true NINJA MASTER!

Default Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse 1 - Attack

Mouse 2 - Shield

Mouse 3 - Kick

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

E - Interact
